titleStmt.title: The intentions of the army of the kingdome of Scotland, declared to their brethren of England, by the commissioners of the late parliament, and by the generall, noblemen, barons, and others, officers of the army

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Bryson, and are to be solde at his shop at the signe of Jonah,
